patthana21.29:1.1: Nahetuṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.29:2.1: Nahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.29:3.1: Nahetuṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
